website_summaries.verdict: An affordable 2-in-1 activity center and jumper from a trusted brand. The best deal for budget conscious buyers.
pros: Ultra sturdy frame for safe jumping and play
Features responsive jump-activated music, sounds, and lights
Colorful toys are well dispersed to provide entertainment and encourage exploration
Offers plenty of activities and entertainment for little ones at an affordable price
cons: Rotating seat can be a bit sticky
Meager selection of melodies and not all parents enjoy the music

customer_reviews.title: Causing Scratches
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy, but the one we got gives my little one scratches on his bottom area where it rest in the seat. He goes in it happily to play, but always comes out crying. Began to notice scratches soon after that. And once I discontinued using it, no new scratches appeared. Returning the item 😌
customer_reviews.author: Ankit Y Shah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our rainforest jumperoo! My baby loves this jumper and even falls asleep in it from jumping so much :) we regret not getting it sooner we got it when he was around 6mo
customer_reviews.author: Sandra P.

customer_reviews.title: 360 degree seat does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great toy in concept and it does keep him entertained briefly but I’m super disappointed with the 360 degree seat as there is a lot of resistance and it is super hard to turn. I’ve double checked that it’s installed correctly so I have to wonder if it’s a manufacturing error as I have to force the seat with a fair amount of strength to get it to turn and it’s clear my baby will never be able to do it on his own. Also the leg openings are kinda small and it’s very hard to get my babies feet through the openings. Overall pretty disappointing for how much this product cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: What a great thing to have!
customer_reviews.text: I had to talk my daughter (first baby) into having something to put the little guy in where he would be safe and could play while she did other things. I finally convinced her and I purchased this jumperoo instead of an exer-saucer or walker. I'm so glad I did. Being a music teacher, it was great to have my grandson have so much fun jumping to the music and me singing along as the songs played. Have some great videos of all the fun! Love that you can adjust the height of the seat as the baby grows taller. Worth every penny! It is not easy to take apart, so expect to primarily keep it in one room.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is just terrible. The item came with slightly yellowed plastic instead of white, so it looked old. The stickers were misaligned. The clear plastic parts were smeared with glue all around the seams. We exchanged for a new one, and that one had some white and some yellowed plastic, the pieces didn’t even match. On this one, some of the edges were waivy. Same issue with the smeared glue, this one also had a crack in the clear plastic. Stickers again misaligned. It’s a shame because we had the old version 3 years ago for our older child, and that one was a completely different level of quality. This will be returned, we will try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Loved it !
customer_reviews.text: As new parent your always looking for things that can help your little one get on there feet and this product will do exactly just that. It was very easy to assemble and easy to store away because you can fold it in half which is very helpful. It was quite a joy for us to see our little jumping around and trying out all the bell and whistles on her new toy . We loved it so much that yes we bought several more for our friends ! Recommended .
customer_reviews.author: Wisd45

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: This looked like a lot of fun but the day this arrived at my son’s house, his baby’s doctor said no bouncing play sets. She said babies stand on their toes instead of their feet. So I bought a stationary play set instead.
customer_reviews.author: DMak

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old at the time really loved this seat! He is now 7 months old and jumping just as he was at 4 months. The straps are adjustable so that it grows with the baby, but after a few weeks we will have to get him a new toy because his feet will have touched the ground probably at around 8 months. This toy does not reccomend that the babys feet lay flat on the ground but that they are on their tip toes so the babies will outgrow it. Worth the money to entertain your little one. Plays music and has various toys. My baby loves the crunchy sound the toy fly makes !
customer_reviews.author: Xavie

customer_reviews.title: Product love
customer_reviews.text: Omg if you have a baby that is happy and loves to play this product is a must have. It sings and my little guys can jump all day. Its also very comfortable he would fall asleep while using it at times. I am thinkibg of storing this product for my second child. I am happy with the money i spent on this product. I only wish it could adkust for the height of my son. He is a veru tall baby and may not be able to jump in this for much longer. He is 6 months and 27.5 inches tall.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a parent's and child's dream
customer_reviews.text: My little one has been bouncing in this for a couple of months now at 8 months old. He laughs, mumbles, makes all types of super happy and excited noises. He can't get enough of this. It is super safe, easy to put together, has all types of interactive stuff to play with. We often can put him in it and then do chores, cook, or other hands free work while he bounces and watches one of us. It is durable and colorful. It is very entertaining to watch a happy child bouncing all around on his own learning with the toys that come attached. Favorite toy for him and for us.. a steal for the money,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This jumper is so fun! Lots of activities for baby to do and even better the activities allow the baby to grow into it as well. The size adjustments are great for also allowing baby to grow into! I started my baby out at 3 months and he is now 4 months and still loving it. The only big con o have with this item is that the seat is a pain in the butt to take on and off to clean! My baby loves to spit up so I make sure to put a blanket inside the seat and around the top so I dont have to take it out to wash it alot.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla D. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this put together. When I opened the box the parts were dirty which was annoying but I wiped it all down with a Clorox wipe and moved on. Then I noticed that the rainbow spinning wheel was bent and hard to spin, the roller balls are sharp where they seal together and most annoyingly the seat itself is lopsided! So, one of my daughters feet touches the floor and the other one only her toes reach. Very disappointed in this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Toxic - Contains phthalates!
customer_reviews.text: Toxic - contains phthalates! There is a bug toy on the jumperoo that is meant to be played with, and with this age group that means put in the mouth. It contains phthalates, which are chemicals linked to endocrine and reproductive problems in infants. I'm absolutely horrified!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: So far so good we just opened and put it together pretty easily. My son is almost 3 months old and hold his head up he also pushes with his legs all the time so we thought that we would buy this he's about an inch too short on the lowest setting nothing a little pillow won't help.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lavoie

customer_reviews.title: You win some you lose some
customer_reviews.text: We received our jumperoo tonight. The set-up was really easy and fast and the product itself is nice so that is why it got three stars...the problem is the price for what you get...I really think that there could be more to it. Also, I didn't receive the leaves that attach to the top bars, so therefore I am waiting another 7 days for those. Overall nice product but definitely disappointed in the packaging and price.
customer_reviews.author: Leighann Preston

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it, but quality lacking a little
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 5 month old for Christmas and he was instantly obsessed! I think I could have used it around 3 months. It was great to get 20 minutes or so to eat while he was bouncing lol. Only downside was after a couple months one of the poles started moving. My son is not at the weight limit so it was weird. It's still very stable but it squeaks a little and it was concerning.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is nice. My boy lovds jumping on it. Only problem is that its not good for traveling, like going to you parents house and bringing it along. The levels for height is toooooooooooooooooo far apart. Hes at the lowest setting but now ots a little too low, changed to 2(higher). When i did it was too high. So maybe more setting levels would be helpful and better for the babies.
customer_reviews.author: Kao Chang

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this jumper! She has one at daycare that she loves being in and would jump up and down when I picked her up every day. She loves standing on her feet at 5 months and this helps her do that. It also gives my arms a break. There is a lot of toys for her to play with and she loves the bring the butterfly to her mouth since her teeth have started to come in. Right now it’s on the lowest setting to the ground and we don’t have to put anything under her feet. I would definitely recommend this to parents with active infants. It keeps her amused while I get other things done.
customer_reviews.author: ssp

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable and the grandchildren enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: We have 5 month-old twin granddaughters who are about as similar as a chestnut horse is similar to a horse chestnut. One sits in the seat and watches and "talks" to the dangling toys. The other bounces so high she can she can grab the toys and take them down. No destruction yet, but I imagine that's coming. The jumper itself seems quite durable and will likely last as long as the girls use it. Be sure you have limits on the movement of the jumper, as the jumping of our turbo child moves it around the kitchen more than we expected. Don't allow it to get close to an open staircase or things she could knock over.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Geek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome baby jumper, tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like about this, keeps my baby occupied and thinking. He has so much fun it, it usually tires him out to have a good nap or sleep. My other son loved this bouncer when he was small, so this was a no brainier. My new baby loves jumping to start the music and he loves putting the firefly in his mouth just like his older brother did. My baby just made 5 months and perfect for him. Only thing is that the baby will need to hold up their necks on their own to enjoy this bouncer. I highly recommend this bouncer.
customer_reviews.author: Big T

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product my boy loves it, when he gets tired of jumping we swap him into his play center for a little while longer. Makes raising an infant much easier. The sound and lights stopped working, after a phone call with customer support a new sound module was on the way free of charge.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Meleshchuk

customer_reviews.title: It’s decent and it does the job...
customer_reviews.text: My almost 4 month baby loves to jump on it. It was a bit tall for her but I added a mat underneath and it worked great. Also she is in that stage where she just wants everything in her mouth, so she started to chew on the seat... she got a rash on her chin from it. It was easy to assemble. Although the toys it comes with it aren’t very fun. The seat is hard to spin around so her just stands in one direction. Over all I think it does the job although I wouldn’t buy it again if I had the choice.
customer_reviews.author: Yarisa Perez

customer_reviews.title: Definitely awesome
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old sister actually had this EXACT model when she was a baby, and like my sweet baby, she LOVED it! The only reason I gave this 4 stars is because one of the 3 straps is an inch or more longer than the rest, causing it to be totally unlevel. I think its just a fluke for me, but if you're little one is able to hold their head up and you want them to get stronger while being able to play, get this jumper! You won't regret it, unless yours is also wonky, but then you can get a refund, so win-win.
customer_reviews.author: KyMaldonado

customer_reviews.title: Open box is not always of value
customer_reviews.text: Got it from Amazon Warehouse...no instructions and pieces missing. Will order again at full price...
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline hunter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for active 4 month old ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 month old son loves it! As a huge 4 month old (18.5 pounds), he loves to stand already. We have another bouncer at grandmas that he likes but doesn’t quite reach the ground (and he’s pretty long himself) but this bouncer he not only reaches the ground on the lowest setting but he gets a really good bounce in this thing. Loves the toys on it and it’s not as bulky as other bounces I’ve seen (although it IS BIG and will take up space). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble even though it was missing the directions and screws. Luckily I had some that worked out and it was easy to figure out from the picture how it went together. Overall my daughter is very happy with this and I am happy to see her get even more activity in her day. The quality of this item is pretty good and I like how the height is adjustable. The only complaint I have is that all of these jumpers have a low weight capacity. I do recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Bunz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this jumper!!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES to bounce in this seat!! He is 6 months now but has been bouncing in this seat since he was about 3-4 months. When he was younger he loved the lights that go off when he started bouncing but now that he’s a little older he really enjoys playing with the toys. Definitely worth the money :)
customer_reviews.author: Khristen Sneed

customer_reviews.title: and he really enjoyed sitting and jumping in the Jumperoo
customer_reviews.text: My baby son loves the Jumperoo. When we were visiting relatives in another country, they had one that another one of their grandchildren used 7 years ago, and he really enjoyed sitting and jumping in the Jumperoo. It is easy to take apart for storage and shipping, but the cost to internationally ship that one to our home was absurdly high. So we had to buy one. I am giving it 5 stars even though the battery-powered toy on the Jumperoo we bought did not work - Fisher-Price/Mattel was very responsive in getting us a replacement for that part.
customer_reviews.author: expatde

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: My baby started using this around 4 months old and LOVED it! He is now 6 months old and still loves it BUT the frame is totally bent. When he is in the jumper he is leaning towards one side and there is no way to fix it. He is 21 lbs so he's big for his age but the max weight is 26 lbs and the frame has been bent for weeks so weight is not the issue here. It is poorly made. I would NOT recommend this jumper.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Jump!  Jump!  Jump!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect jumper! We got it when the baby was only 5 months and initially, he loved it. He fell out of love with it for about 3 weeks, but now he is jumping until he's exhausted (he's 7 months now)! As babies become more aware, I think they will like the jumper more. They will play with the attached toys and make noise to entertain themselves. It gives them playtime and allows for some adult time (if necessary). It super-easy to assemble and it collapses as easily. I"m glad we found this!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Entertains our 4 month old baby
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended for anyone on the fence about buying this it keeps our baby entertained for at least 15-20min. He’s especially happy and having a great time jumping and laughing when we are right by him bouncing around with him. It was easy to set up, but that wouldn’t even matter if it was complicated (which it wasn’t) to set up because it would’ve been worth it. The only con if I had to reach for something bad about this product is that sometimes it’s not simple to get him in and out of it, but that’s like any baby product like this like a baby chair or something.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My boy just turned 4months old so he’s still a little young to utilize this toy completely. Physically, I feel he is safe while in it but, I think it will be even better when he’s a little bigger. And each day that passes, he interacts with it more and more and is now starting to kick and jump. If your looking for another tool in the shed to give you another 30-60 mins of Hands-free time from baby, I’d recommend it. I think as he gets older he will want to spend more and more time in it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Johnson

customer_reviews.title: but i saw many nice reviews so I thought i should get one for ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby she is Five months old,it cost one hundred dollars was much over my budget,but i saw many nice reviews so I thought i should get one for my baby . But only five days! Five days! Some parts were fall down! Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy chen

customer_reviews.title: A Parent’s Best Friend!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing we have bought so far! My daughter has loved this since she was around 5 months old... we are 2 months in and going strong! She can jump and entertain herself for an hour at a time, which as all parents know is a big deal!! Would buy this a million times over!!! Not only does she love all of the spinners, toys and lights - but the jumping keeps her entertained for ages! And it’s so much safer than our door jumper!
customer_reviews.author: tdjangles

customer_reviews.title: Little one had lots of fun in this.
customer_reviews.text: My lil one loved to jump in her jumperoo. She liked the music and animal sounds, she loved pulling the birds off the top part though. The bar at the bottom is able to collapse when you need to move it which is really nice when getting it thru doorways. Overall I was really pleased with it. She's about to be a year old and still fits in it when adjusted to the highest setting, but sadly she just isn't interested in it anymore though. I gave it four stars only because I think the price is a bit much.... I would try to get it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Fun Bouncer!
customer_reviews.text: My son really enjoys this bouncer. He loves all the toys and happily will stand and try to bounce for a half hour. My mom is jealous of ours compared to the one at her house. Love the different activites and the bright colors. Docked a star because for some reason I hate the music on it for some reason. Of all the musical toys we have this is the only one that really gets to me. It has a somewhat repetitive beat.
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great jumper, but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Our baby loves this jumper. Overall, we’re glad we have it, though have pros and cons. Pros: sturdy, adjustable height, pretty easy to assemble, multiple interactive pieces Cons: too expensive, takes up a lot of space, our 6 month old sometimes manages to pull off the rainbow/sun piece and the 2 overhead hanging leaf pieces, and our LO can’t turn the seat around without assistance like we’d hoped
customer_reviews.author: Elle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Some parts weren’t new.
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I had was that my product had been previously used. I thought that for $111 I was getting a new product, but the base pads were dirty and one of the spinners looked new but the other looked used. All fabrics seemed clean and new - just some of the frame wasn’t. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Get one!
customer_reviews.text: Minus one star for advertising "no tool assembly" and then the first instruction is to pre-instal batteries with a screwdriver. It's not a big deal, but it's pretty tongue-in-cheek to have to say "well, technically, the batteries aren't required in installation." This thing is fantastic! Our daughter gets so excited when she gets to play in this! Fun fact: this product, at the time of our purchase, qualified for Amazon's baby registry completion discount. Register for it, then wait. :)
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Vail

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This Jumperoo was the perfect gift for my grandson, who's been an active wiggler and lap jumper since day one. We've had it a couple of months and he never tires of it. His main activity is jumping, but he also plays with the various toys mounted on the rim. He also enjoys sucking on the animals hanging from the leaves. Those Fisher-Price folks really know babies and toys! One bit of advice: The padded frog that lines the seat is a little difficult to put on the pegs. I recommend you ignore the instructions, which are very confusing, hold the padded seat and plastic rim together and just muscle it on. Have fun! Makes for great videos!
customer_reviews.author: Fran S.

customer_reviews.title: My 5 month old grandson LOVES his new jumpy seat!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old grandson LOVES his new jumpy seat!!!! It only took him a few tries to figure out how to use his feet to make the seat bounce! At first he would pull his feet up...felt weird I guess, but after a day or so he is jumping and bouncing and smiling!!!!!! Best Christmas gift I bought him this year!!! I can see him getting stronger every day from the exercise. Going to be crawling soon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Jerky motion terrifies my baby
customer_reviews.text: My baby is almost 6 months and loves to jump. He has one of the jumpers that hangs from a doorframe but I thought this would be more fun for him since it has toys. Unfortunately when he bounces it shakes him all over the place and he’s terrified of it. The motion is more side to side rather than up and down. I’ve tried a dozen times and he won’t sit in it for more than 5 minutes. Other jumpers are a much smoother ride.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price for tons of entertainment and exercise
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bouncy activity gym for my 4 month old daughter, and she loved it from the get-go. She is a little small for her age, so I had to place a small, folded up blanket behind her and a pillow under her feet at first. But now that she is 8 months old, she bounces with no problems, and she still loves it! There are so many spinning, dangling, bouncy, rattling, crinkly things for her to play with! It keeps her occupied for a good while - so mommy can have a breather or clean up a bit around the house!
customer_reviews.author: BeckyWecky

customer_reviews.title: Little Development Center to Keep Child Active
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Feels quite sturdy in part because the base is very wide. This contraption has a wide circumference! If you have a small apartment, it may not be for you. Regarding setup: I didn't use the instructions- I found them to be more of a headache. Seat was a little odd to put on despite instructions but no big deal. 4 month old loves bouncing and playing with attached toys (he is a tall 4 month old- 95th percentile for height). Maybe better for an average 5 to 6 month old. There are adjustable straps to raise or lower the seating structure.
customer_reviews.author: Taliak

customer_reviews.title: Best buy ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best buy ever! My 5 month old was bouncing in my arms constantly which prompted me to look for something that would help save my arms... while searching I found this and wow, it’s amazing! We have had it for a few weeks now and my son loves it and plays in it daily for hours! He loves to bounce and I like that it plays decent music - nothing too annoying! The toys on there continue to peak his interest and he’s now figured out how to rotate in it! It takes us a bit of room but so worth it! Wasn’t too hard to setup either! Don’t forget batteries!!
customer_reviews.author: Kass

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous! Baby fell and hit his head
customer_reviews.text: Very dangerous! One of the metal lever that connects to the straps that holds the seat up slid to unleash as its poorly designed & has no safety lock so as a result baby fell. Very pissed off. Safety hazard & do not recommend to anybody. We threw ours in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: nara

customer_reviews.title: babies bounce for hours
customer_reviews.text: this is the second bouncer we bought because one just wasn't enough with twins. they each have their own. the height adjustment could be easier..... its elastic isn't as stiff so if you have a high percentile weight baby they might weigh it down but it has more toys and things for babies to play with. overall I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pudwater

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product five stars as all of my babies have loved it, but the seat doesn't turn as readily as the Evenflo Exersaucer seat does. I recently bought this product to replace an identical model I had for other children and had since given away. I don't remember it being a problem with that seat. I even tried WD-40, but it just doesn't turn easily. Still a great product though and lots of fun. If it were easier to adjust the height and easier to turn the seat, I'd have rated it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy to 5

customer_reviews.title: Just Get It!
customer_reviews.text: My son just turned 4 months old and we put this together for him to use....it took him 15 minutes to figure out how to jump around and then it was ON. He L-O-V-E-S this thing and how do I know, because he missed his bottle time and he does NOT play around with feedings...I had to pull him out after almost an hour to feed him! This is definitely the best purchase we've made thus far, hands down, I'm envisioning all of the things I'll be able to take care of around the house while he has the time of his little life!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M

customer_reviews.title: Get baby busy and moving.
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. So perfect for babies that can't sit up on their own yet. Lots of support all around. Began using this with my granddaughter at exactly her 3 month mark. By 4 months she is a pro in it. Of course they begin using it in short spurts but over time they build up their attention span. Great for motor skills and eye to hand coordination. They enjoy feelibg their feet touch the floor too. Right away she began enjoying using her feet and legs. Love the fact that the seat is removable so it can be washed. We've had zero issues with ours. Get a door jumper too. Babies love to be busy.
customer_reviews.author: SLF

customer_reviews.title: Defective- super bummed new mom 😢
customer_reviews.text: I bought this while I was pregnant on prime day and just finally my baby is big enough to put it together and use it.. once I started putting it together I noticed that the battery asssembly screw was completed stripped out and defective so there is no way to open the case to put batteries in.. I’m super bummed because I was so excited for my little one to use this but now she won’t be able to enjoy the musical aspect... super bummed
customer_reviews.author: kliefert

customer_reviews.title: Terrific choice
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this and will likely be sad when it is put away which will be soon. He is very close to the 25 pound weight limit. There was a small amount of fray around one of the seat connectors but it is holding up okay. Would like to be able to remove the buttery fly to be able to clean it more adequately. I wonder about the bird and frog that he easily pulls off the two posts but he seems to like doing it. Parts of it are hard for the baby initially but as he developed it was a new accomplishment. A Best Buy for sure.
customer_reviews.author: cathym52

customer_reviews.title: A bit overpriced
customer_reviews.text: For $110, I feel a little ripped off here, idk. The jumperoo I received is filthy and all scratched up. Was it refurbished? Did it fall out of the box in transit, into a ditch, and repackaged? I don’t know. Baby’s feet are pretty flat footed on lowest setting, but he doesn’t come close to the ground on the second setting. 🙄. Six month old baby doesn’t even like it. I will keep trying it though; sometimes what he doesn’t like one day, he likes the next. Babies are fickle, man.
customer_reviews.author: Steinman

customer_reviews.title: Best money I've ever spent!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best money I've ever spent!! My daughter absolutely loves this toy. It was super easy to put together. I did it with the instructions in 10 min. She isn't very good at sitting up just yet, but this seat is super supportive and she is able to sit up and move around without falling over or to the side. Definitely making her legs stronger as she is constantly jumping all around in it. I love watching her play in it. Best toy ever!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie R.

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this jumper, seems like we picked the best one, I really do not see any negative parts of it. Good quality for a jumper and good music. Baby loves the toys on it. Pretty colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 month old goes crazy on this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a total lifesaver. My 5 month old LOVES to jump, and this is perfect to keep him occupied. He wasn't too interested at first, but one day he just started jumping and went crazy! It was great. I love the option of the revolving chair, so there is always something new to discover. Also, the adjustable heights are great too. As with any toy that makes noise, you can get a bit annoyed, but I will take that over crying. This was just what we needed, and is lightweight so its easy to transport to any part of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Omg yes!!
customer_reviews.text: Every since we got this he has had no interest in anything else, he absolutely loves it! He was 3 months when we got it and he could touch perfectly, now at 4 months we have moved it up a level and still perfect! It was pretty easy to put together and definitely worth it! Love that it will grow with him, and the removable seat pad definitely a bonus for a drooly baby! This is absolutely a must have!!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer Service I have ever encountered from Fisher Price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Jumperoo 2 years ago for our son and he loved it. Started using it for our daughter who loved it as well. One day grandpa fell over opening a window (no one was hurt, just grandpa's ego) and broke one of the vertical poles so I contacted Fisher Price (Mattel) and experienced the best customer service I have ever encountered. They offered me a refund even after I told them we have had it for over 2 years and it was our fault it broke. This little scheme of having loyal customers by offering amazing customer service worked on me. I will always look for fisher price. Thank you so much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lovett

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVEEE this thing. Do not hesitate to make the purchase, the way I did. My baby loves it. I never knew he could get so wild. Lol. And he falls asleep EVERY SINGLE time he uses it. I bought it when he was 4months old. He’s now 5 months old. Apart from all of the fun, this product helps with development in many ways. One thing I was happy about was that after his first week of using the jumperoo, whenever I held him up, he began to stand up sturdier . Before he would stand up for a little bit (with me holding him) and quickly let his legs just drop down.
customer_reviews.author: FirstTimeMom

customer_reviews.title: Too cute
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it, the only thing I have a problem with is the I didnt know that they weight limit was 25lbs my grandson is 2 months old he was a big baby almost 10lbs and he is now 18lbs so how much use is he really going to get out of it. Idk it is very cute and he loves bouncing in it. It is good quality, easy to assemble, and it's very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Fisher Price Rain Forest Jumper Gift for Baby and Mommy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful! Did alot of research to see which was best jumper to purchase. Bought as gift for new granddaughter and she loves it, as well as her mommy! Helps entertain and baby plays and gets exercise so mommy gets a few things done while watching baby! She got one from other grandma too in different theme, so now there's one upstairs and downstairs. Very colorful and very happy I got this one!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My child LOVESSSS to jump around in this jumper all day. Extremely safe and would recommend to all. Easy to assemble and move around. Pretty safe as well. My husband and I did our research for a jumper that is reasonably priced, safe, and educational for children. This one hit all the marks and them some.
customer_reviews.author: Alex9113

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old loves this toy and squeals with delight when she sees it! It allows her to jump up and down, turn herself 360 degrees and practice standing. She seems to love the attached toys and hasn’t tired of them. The music volume can be shut off or has a high/low volume setting which is an added bonus in my mind. Also, the seat adjusts to 3 height settings. I highly recommend this jumper and couldn’t have been more pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jewelry girl

customer_reviews.title: Must buy !
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I bought this. My son loves it and I love the break it gives me! I bought this when my son was 5 months and I wasn’t going to buy it cause I thought I should have bought it when he was like 2 months, and I wasted too much time. But I’m glad I went ahead and bought it. Even though it’s a little expensive I feel like it is so worth it. I use it every single day. And he stays in this longer than another other seat/bouncer I have. I feel like this is a must have especially when you have more than one child.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: ... when my nephew had the same one he absolutely loved it. I received mine today and the switch ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this because when my nephew had the same one he absolutely loved it. I received mine today and the switch to change between sounds is faulty and needs to be taped all the way to the side to be held in place to make sound other wise all's that happens is the lights go off but no sound. Same for when I switch for the sound to be playing at all times instead of just when she bounces. I am pretty bummed and would like my money back....
customer_reviews.author: Danny R. Kaler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this! He started using it at six months and is now almost eight month and still loves it. He uses it multiple times a day. It’s very sturdy and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth B.

customer_reviews.title: Oh my goodness - this jumper is amazing! We bought it for our 5 month old ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness - this jumper is amazing! We bought it for our 5 month old grandson and he absolutely loves it! The seat rotates so he can look at all the attached 'toys' on the jumper, it plays music in 2 different volumes, and he can sit in it for long periods of time, just jumping and smiling. The look on his face is priceless. It's very well made, and sturdy. We love it and when our son saw how much his son liked it, he bought one too! This jumper is totally worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: This Jumperoo seems like a great product
customer_reviews.text: This Jumperoo seems like a great product. However, after 9 days of use, the music part stopped playing! The lights were still lighting up and we tried changing batteries, but it made no difference. I called Fisher Price and they told me to return it. Once they receive the product, they will send out a new one. Hopefully I just got a defective one. It does look super cool for my baby. She loves using her legs so I can see why it's so popular. I will update once I receive a new one and had it for a longer period of time.
customer_reviews.author: jy24

customer_reviews.title: Super fun jumper
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My baby loves to jump in there!!! It is very entertaining for him! If your floor is hard make sure to have your baby wear some shoes or thick socks. Assembly was difficult cause the instructions are not clear, watch a youtube video and then it is super easy. The jumper is pretty big but is light enough that you can move without much effort.
customer_reviews.author: Ana B

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 7 month old and he enjoys it but not for too long. It helps when we are cooking or need to do something around the house. I did not realize how bulky it would be and if you want to take it with you to visit grandparents you have to take somethings apart so that can fit in back of our small SUV, definitely better just to use at home
customer_reviews.author: Hernan Collazos

customer_reviews.title: Great interactive toy for my energetic 3 1/2 month old
customer_reviews.text: Great product, perfect for my 3 month old with much time to grow into it. He can hang out in here entertained for 30 minutes or more, giving me time to get some things done around the house. He loves wiggling around and jumping and I think this toy has helped him better interact with his surroundings. He really enjoys grabbing at the butterfly piece that pulls out and has figured out how to start the music again by spinning the wheel. I’d like to think this is helping with his cognitive development as well as hand-eye coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda VanAmburg

customer_reviews.title: This toy is great! So easy to put it together
customer_reviews.text: This toy is great! So easy to put it together. I did it by myself while pregnant and there were no cuss words or tantrums. My daughter unfortunately doesn't really like it but at 6 months I think it's a little over stimulating for her with all the music and everything. She likes to eat the little crinkle butterfly on the side and hit the spin parts but gets made she can't touch the birds and cries when the music is on. My two year old however loves the music. Either way this toy was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 6 month old
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 6 month old and she loves it. She jumps and jumps and laughs a lot while in it. I really like that it has 3 levels so as she gets taller I can adjust it to fit her better.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining / Bigger Than You Think
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves this thing. So many toys, lights, sounds to entertain her!. Watching her first few minutes made the the 1 1/2 hour assembly time worth it. The instructions are not great to say the least, otherwise this would be a 5 star product. Caution: the bottom of the unit is quite large in diameter. After assembling, it was too large to get through the room door, so I had to disassemble it to get it out of the house, then into my son's house, before reassembling. My advice is to assemble in the room where it will stay.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: I can do the dishes now!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her jumperoo! She is almost 6 months old and has been using it for just over a month. In the beginning, she could only do it for about 10 minutes at a time, but now, it keeps her entertained for about 20-30 minutes! She has a huge smile on her face every time she is in it :) Also, I did not put any batteries in it, but she still loves spinning the toys on it, and chewing on the dragonfly. It has given this mommy some her sanity back!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thing. We got it for her over a month ago. She is 7 months now and I wanted to see how she likes it before writing the review. She loves it and It keeps her busy the whole time she is in it. The bouncer was very easy to setup. I had it un boxed and put it together in less than 10 minutes. Every piece fit together perfect and there was easy to follow instructions. The bouncer is very large in diameter so make sure you have e plenty of space to put it up. Do not question yourself this is a mist have. Or a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed of used toys
customer_reviews.text: The only pro is that it arrived in like a day and I was super excited to assemble it until I opened the packaging, I opened two toys and those toys had scratches on them like it’s been used I didn’t even bother to assemble the product because my baby deserves new toys for the price I am paying. I am disappointed so I am buying this product elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: HAOYAN SHI

customer_reviews.title: He LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson LOVED the Jumperoo! At six months he took to it immediately. The three interative activity centers kept his attention. The height adjustment is a plus as he will enjoy it for a long time. I removed a star because it came damaged. They shipped it in the original box. I recommend that it be shipped within another box.
customer_reviews.author: TECHing It Easy

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a couple of months and have been disappointed. Baby loved jumping in it but most of the attachment toys are not interesting to her. Could have made the monkey,the Tucan and the elephant more accessible for little arms and detachable for cleaning. The hanging bird and frog can’t be reached and is very frustrating for her. I would keep looking if you’re considering this.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money—parts don’t work properly
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve ever bothered writing a review, because that’s how frustrated I am. The battery operated part on the toy appears used—it has scratches on it and some sort of yucky film that’s sticky on it. The leaf pieces that hang from the top are maneuverable.. only one of them stays in place when maneuvering it. Not worth the money. And who wants to take it apart and cram it in a box to send it back? I just want the toy to work after i dropped 100+ bucks on it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: good design overall, little wobbly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a warehouse deal, but it still cost a pretty penny. I don't know if it is just my unit, but the base doesn't seem to be extraordinary sturdy. I'm not concerned with it falling or anything, but the poles tilt and lift the bottom ring off the ground when my daughter jumps around. Toys are fine; basically on par with what you would expect in a kids product. I like the height and design, but wish the construction was a little more seamless and sturdy. I don't think I would pay full retail.
customer_reviews.author: Cale P.

customer_reviews.title: Do these come in adult sizes?
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my g'daughter when she was six months old. It is the single best gift I've given any of my grandchildren. She is a "high maintenance" baby, but when I put her in this Fisher-Price Rainforest Jumperoo so I can get something done, she has such a great time that I end up watching her enjoying herself rather than getting anything done! She absolutely loves it, it entertains her for extended periods of time, I know she's safe in it, and every household with an active, busy baby needs one! If I have a complaint, and I don't, it's that I wish I had one for every room.
customer_reviews.author: Lyric

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson for Christmas. He was just a little over 3 months, but I went ahead and got it because they grow so fast. He was too short to touch the floor even on the lowest setting, so we put a folded comforter underneath so he was able to make it bounce. He's a strong little boy and seems to NEVER stop moving., so I knew he would love it! My daughter was a little leary at first (1st baby), but loves it as much as he does now - he's entertained while bouncing in the kitchen while cooking. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Mom and Baby approved!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase! My baby loves it, we started using it around 3 & 1/2 months old after he was able to fully support his head. I have seen a huge improvement in his leg strength from all his time jumping and he loves figuring out how to use the attached toys as well. It was very easy to put together, easy to adjust height and wash seat cover as needed. It is very sturdy and good quality. Definitely one of our favorite toys!
customer_reviews.author: JRSwan

customer_reviews.title: great for babies 6mo+
customer_reviews.text: purchased when baby was only 3 months.. probably a littler early bc she did not enjoy it and could barely hold herself fully. Once she reached 6 months she started to love it and get the hang of the jumping thing. She lovesssss bouncing to the music and loves all of the toys. Good buy I would say for babies 6 months plus!
customer_reviews.author: JBLAKE

customer_reviews.title: I love this jumperoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this jumperoo! It's so colorful and has lots of components for playing and learning. The baby loved it immediately and will happily play in it for up to an hour at a time (normally he can't take any activity past 30 minutes at this age.) We gave it to him when he was just over 3 months and we felt he had good enough neck control (he's got better than average neck control for a baby his age). He was a bit short, so we put a coffee table book under it so his legs could reach and he could bounce. The product works well and it's easy to adjust the music. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaG

customer_reviews.title: So far, okay.
customer_reviews.text: The Jumperoo was easy to assemble. My 5 month old is on the fence. She'll enjoy it on her own for a few minutes before crying until I bounce her myself! The entire reason I purchased the Jumperoo was so she could entertain herself while I got a few things done, not so I could hold her legs and bounce her myself! =P I figure maybe within the next month or so she'll be bouncing in it on her own! I'm not going to knock stars off just because my 5 month old has me whipped.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 6-month old baby!
customer_reviews.text: My 6-month old baby boy super loves it! As first time parents, this is the first jumperoo that we ever bought for him and we're worried if he would play with this but he did and we're super happy. No doubt it's good for babies who can support his head and sit with support as my son can sit and rotate on his chair and stand at the same time play with the toys. He also loves the sounds of the animals while he keeps on jumping around. It is also safe to use on flat surface and easy to assemble. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Marie S. Ang

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, wonderful design, super functional
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one of these. We purchased one for my now four year old when she was a baby and gave it away when we moved. We now have a three month old and needed something interactive for her and this is absolutely perfect! My 16 year old daughter assembled it in less than ten minutes and baby girl loved it immediately! One of my favorite things is how you can easily clean under it since it sits directly on your floor with no plastic bottom like some exersaucers.
customer_reviews.author: Kennyandchristina

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this thing
customer_reviews.text: She absolutely loves playing in this thing. She is 5 months old (so just shy the recommended age) but tall for her age. She will get quite a bit of usage out of it. I do not really see it "fold-able" Sure, you can press a button, and one of the legs can be moved to reduce the footprint, but not by much. It is huge (something several others have mentioned). Otherwise, looks to be a great investment in my child's growth.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Love this Jumperoo
customer_reviews.text: Our son LOVES this. It keeps him entertained with all the different activities and the noises/lights encourage him to jump around. It has a crinkly bug toy that he can pull towards him and chew, a few things to spin/turn, some overhead plush hanging toys (that he's obsessed with trying to pull down), a tiger that pops up with the push of a button, etc. There are also various height settings and you're able to adjust the volume as well as choose between constant music/sounds and sounds that will only go off when the baby jumps.The seat itself also turns so you can change the direction/toys they're facing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: If you can get past the pricetag, GET THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is way cooler than what my daughter had 7 years ago. They can actually BOUNCE on this, and boy does my little man do just that. The first few times he tried it, he was out like a light within 20 mins, just from so much exercise, lol. The toys are much more interesting than what my daughter had on her saucer bouncer years ago as well, I can see this entertaining him for a while. And the fold up feature...amazing. Very easy to travel with, since you can just fold the saucer part sideways while the poles line up together. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liska

customer_reviews.title: Great product, unclear assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this jumparoo and will sit there for hours. Great product except that the directions don’t explain how to attach the seat and the fabric keeps popping off the seat. It took me 30 min to build because it took me 25 minutes to figure out how to attach the seat. Now that the fabric if falling off, I can’t get the seat off.
customer_reviews.author: R. Erlich

customer_reviews.title: like Disneyland for a baby!
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research and comparisons on jumpers. They are so pricey overall! This one seemed like the best deal and as I had a taller baby, per other reviews seemed like it would be a good fit. This was easy to assemble and clean. The baby loves it! Not only jumping but all of the music, colors, and toys! It is like Disneyland for a baby! We rotate her to different stations and she went from staring at things to grabbing, spinning, jumping, reaching,- just so fun! Would highly recommend~
customer_reviews.author: AZShopper

customer_reviews.title: Cool But...
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of the jumper but of course when I put it all together and batteries are in, nothing works. Took all the time and spent my money to get this for my son and none of the music or lights work on the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Sperfslage

customer_reviews.title: Son smiles just walking past this.
customer_reviews.text: He loves it so much. He has a blast in this thing. Never gets sick of it. If we are having a fussy day, this makes him smile & laugh, need I say more? It's huge, but it saves the day sometimes so I don't care! We love it for occasional use, as a special treat sort of thing. I've heard these aren't great for hips if used for a long period of time every day. Wesave it for emergencies or those moments we need a break, it's an amazing toy, worth every single penny.
customer_reviews.author: quesolover

customer_reviews.title: Buyers remorse
customer_reviews.text: From the moment we put this together, the seat has always had a pretty severe tilt. Too difficult to return. This does entertain the baby for about 20 minutes at a time, but she always cries to come out because it leaves angry red marks on her thighs. I have buyers remorse with this one.
customer_reviews.author: L. Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Bright and colorful
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gift for my 5 month old son. He absolutely loves it. Pros There are many items on this jumperoo that captures my sons attention Items are easy to grab and spin for little ones Fairly easy to assemble Cons Difficult for little one to spin the item to make music and gets bored when the music doesn't play right away The spinner for the seat is stiff and difficult for younger babies to spin themselves Wish there were more lights and music
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Jumper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this off amazon and it was the cheaper ones but said it would just have a broken box. It was clearly used. I was dirty and hair stuck to it. I cleaned it really good. But other than that was in good condition. I loved the jumperoo for my older son. This baby didn’t like it as much
customer_reviews.author: Jena Beaubien

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer but too big for 4mo old
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old is still too little to really use it even at the lowest setting— her arms can’t reach the toys and her feet don’t reach the ground, but she loves sitting in it and looking at the colorful toys. I can tell that she will love this eventually and grow into it. It was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Cozy

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Rainforest Jumperoo
product_meta.description:
Fisher-Price Rainforest Jumperoo There are so many sights and activities to discover on this brightly colored jumperoo—music, lights and exciting sounds reward baby with every jump! Everywhere baby looks, (in the spinning seat, baby can see all around), there's something fun to do. Busy toys, including a bobble elephant and swinging monkey, captivate baby's attention and keep him entertained. Folds for easy storage and portability -Seat spins 360 so baby can discover toys all around-Sturdy, free-standing steel frame lets baby jump safely—no doorways required-Easily adjusts to three different heights as baby grows-Soft spring covers keep little fingers safe-Busy activities include peek-a-boo tiger, bat-at monkey, rattle lizard, bobble elephant, spinner drum & more-soft, comfy seat pad is machine washable & dryer safe-Folds for storage & on-the-go-durable frame is easy to assemble-Requires 3 AA batteries [Age grade] Maximum weight: 25 LBS (11,3 kg) Maximum height: 32” (81 cm)[Legal] 2013 Mattel. All rights reserved and designate U.S. trademarks of Mattel, except as noted.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
A place full of wonderful sights and sounds the Rainforest Jumperoo brings it all down to size for little explorers. Still tons of safe jumping fun (which will activate rainforest music and lights), but now there are toys all around the rainforest-and overhead-with a spinning seat that helps baby explore them all. This baby jumper features a bobbing elephant, swinging monkey, spinning lizard and more that baby will just go wild for baby spins drum to activate lights and music (Mom can activate for four minutes of continuous play). The baby jumper's soft spring covers keep little fingers safe and three-position height adjustment ensures a custom fit for your child. Requires three AA batteries for toy tray.
feature_bullets: Item arrives in frustration-free, easy-to-open packaging that’s 100% recyclable. For a gift-ready box, select “Ship in Amazon packaging” at checkout
Exciting lights, sounds and music reward your baby's every jump
Infant jumper with 360 degrees of play, including peek-a-boo tiger, bat-at monkey, rattle lizard, and more
3 adjustable height positions to grow with your baby
No doorway required, plus fabric spring covers keep little fingers safe
Soft, comfy seat pad is machine washable and dryer safe
Durable frame is easy to assemble

specifications.Safety warning: Use only for a child who is able to hold head up unassisted and who is not able to climb out or walk. Maximum height 32"
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars11,439 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
